snap(-70,-70,-65)


sky(20,20,20)
fog(45,45,45)
ground(0,0,40)

fadefrom(2500)

name(Downtown Mayhem)

nlaps(5)


set(10,0,0,0)p
set(10,0,5600,0)
chk(40,0,3500,0)
set(28,0,5600,0)

set(22,19600,2000,0)

set(10,15700,0,90)
